channel.title: Xbox Live - Restrictions
channel.description:
I finally got my live account set up, but apparently my xbox reads my email account as someone under age, but yet my birth year is set as 1970. So I created a parental email, same birth year and everything and it's fine. Now if that allowed me to download anything I wanted, that'd be fine but I still can't. I went into the parental controls, allowed everything, restarted and still nothing.
Any ideas? I might just swap the WL ID to the parental one, but then I would have to swap my email to be that one because that's just how I roll.
-Mh

item.title: Xbox Live - Restrictions
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I did, no luck though…

-Mh
